refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: gtk-query-immodules-2.0 collects information about loadable input method modules for GTK+ and writes it to stdout.
If called without arguments, it looks for modules in the GTK+ input method module path.
If called with arguments, it looks for the specified modules. The arguments may be absolute or relative paths.

refsect1.title: Environment
refsect1.para: The environment variable GTK_PATH can be used to prepend directories to the input method module path.
